articles.author: Rhys Blakely
articles.title: The mini backpacks that prove bats hunt birds like fighter jets - The Times
articles.description: Scientists analysed Europe’s biggest bats to find how they target their prey, capturing distress calls and even the sound of chewing
articles.content: For nearly 25 years, scientists were stumped. Feathers had been found in the droppings of Europes largest bat, the greater noctule.Carlos Ibáñez, a Spanish biologist, was convinced that the species, … [+3590 chars]
